content.question: Three identical resistors are connected in series to a battery. Students measure the current <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></math> through the battery and determine the power <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> dissipated in the circuit. Which of the following relationships will result in a linear graph with a slope equal to the equivalent resistance of the three resistors?

choices.label: <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> as a function of <math alttext="I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> as a function of <math alttext="I over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>I</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> as a function of <math alttext="1 over I" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>/</mo><mi>I</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> as a function of <math alttext="I squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> as a function of <math alttext="open parenthesis, I over 3, close parenthesis, squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>I</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>3</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></math> as a function of <math alttext="I squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>I</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
